General.Name: Adi Sarana Armada Tbk
General.Description: PT Adi Sarana Armada Tbk operates as a transportation service company in Indonesia. The company provides rental business services; leasing services without option rights for car, bus, and truck, as well as land transportation not four or more wheeled vehicles; freight transportation of goods such as truck, pick up, and container; and transportation consulting services. It also engages in car trading and car repair business. In addition, the company provides driver services, used vehicle trade through online and offline, parcel delivery services, car sharing, freight forwarding services, and logistics management and warehousing services; and management and consulting services. PT Adi Sarana Armada Tbk was founded in 1999 and is headquartered in North Jakarta, Indonesia.
General.Address: Graha Kirana Building, Jakarta Utara, Indonesia, 14350
